"grom83@..." <grom83@...> writes:

> I'd like to know which tool I have to use to be able to display the
> crawled page offline. I've read about NutchWAX but it seems it cannot
> deal with warc format for the moment.

Have you looked at the Wayback Machine?

  http://archive-access.sourceforge.net/projects/wayback/

It serves archived web pages from WARC and ARC files.


Aaron
